name: Account activity page
description:
On the account activity page of a user a list of Access objects is shown.
A new Access object is created for every request that is made by a user,
we only show the newest of each session.
The tests in this feature file are meant to test whether a user can:
- see his own account activity page
- with the appropriate permission ('account_activity/view'), view another user's account activity page
- cannot see another user's account activity page without that permission

as combo product.

name: List of events
description:
Ticketware uses PTA to show the list of events.
PTA returns results in pages and events
rendered with the initial page load are for the first page of
results.
The rest of events is loaded in the background and repeated
until the number of results returned is less than the page size.
This way all the events of this point of sale are loaded client side.
Events contain the information about the location name and the city.
This is used in the event search (also client side).

elements.name: The list of products displayed to a ticketware user

name: List of products
description:
Ticketware uses PTA to show the list of products.
PTA returns results in pages and products
rendered with the initial page load are for the first page of
results.
The rest of the products is loaded in the background and repeated
until the number of results returned is less than the page size.
This way all the products of this event are loaded client side.
